subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Timofey Mozgov, the Russian rookie, had career highs in points (23) and rebounds (14), and Amar’e Stoudemire led the Knicks with 33 points.
snippet: Timofey Mozgov, the Russian rookie, had career highs in points (23) and rebounds (14), and Amar’e Stoudemire led the Knicks with 33 points.
